food.question: I am yellow, and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I grow on trees.
💛 My color is like the sun.
🏃 You might slip on my peel.

food.question: I am round and red, and I grow on a tree. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White loved me (maybe too much!).
🌱 I start as a tiny flower.
🥧 You can make a pie with me.

food.question: I am long, orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
👀 I'm good for your eyesight.
🥗 You can eat me raw or cooked.

food.question: I am white and fluffy, and I am made from milk. You can eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🐮 I come from an animal.
🍨 I am often served cold.
🍦 You can put toppings on me.

food.question: I am a grain that is often eaten for breakfast. I am cooked in milk or water. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 You might add sugar or fruit to me.
🌾 I come from a field.
🔥 I need to be heated before eating.

food.question: I am a vegetable that can make you cry when you chop me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have many layers.
😩 I can be white, yellow, or red.
🍔 You can put me on a burger.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from a bean. People often drink me in the morning to wake up. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ I'm often served hot.
🌎 I come from all over the world.
😴 I help you not be sleepy.

food.question: I am made from wheat, and I am often eaten with sauce and meatballs. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I come in many shapes and sizes.
🇮🇹 I am very popular in Italy.
💧 I need to be boiled in water.

food.question: I am a sweet treat that is often served at birthday parties. I have frosting and candles on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 You cut me into slices.
🎉 People sing 'Happy Birthday' when I appear.
🍰 I can be chocolate, vanilla, or many other flavors.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and a green flesh. I'm named after a bird! What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I'm small and oval shaped.
🇳🇿 I am grown in New Zealand.
🥄 You can eat me with a spoon.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🐌 I'm not a bug, but I'm super slow!
🥗 Some people eat me with garlic butter.

ocean.question: I am a large mammal that lives in the ocean and spouts water from my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am bigger than a car.
🎶 I sing songs to communicate.
💨 You can see water coming out of my blowhole.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a flat body and both of my eyes are on the same side. What am I?

hints.text: 🪞 I can blend in with the ocean floor.
🎨 I can have different colors to camouflage.
🍴 People enjoy eating me.

ocean.question: I am a colorful parrot of the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have bright, vibrant colors
🐦 People often confuse me with a bird
🦷 I use my beak-like mouth to scrape algae off coral

ocean.question: I have eight arms and can squeeze into small spaces. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
💨 I can squirt ink to get away.
🧠 I am a very smart invertebrate.

ocean.question: I am a big predator with many sharp teeth and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have rows and rows of teeth.
🏊 I am very good at swimming.
🦈 Some people are afraid of me.

ocean.question: I build my home in the sea from tiny animals. I am very colorful and important for marine life. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I'm made of small animals called polyps
☀️ I need sunlight to survive.
🐠 Many fish live in me.

ocean.question: I am a creature that looks like a plant, but I'm actually an animal with stinging tentacles. What am I?

hints.text: 😵 I can sting you if you get too close.
🌊 I float in the water.
🐙 Some look like upside-down jellyfish

ocean.question: I am a long, winding current in the Atlantic Ocean that carries warm water towards Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I affect the weather.
🌎 I am like a river in the ocean.
➡️ I start in the Gulf of Mexico.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean. What am I called?

hints.text: 🕳️ I am a very deep trench.
🌊 No sun reaches me
🌑 The Mariana Trench is the most famous example.
